value: Explore powerful **X-Render** widgets for creating dynamic forms, interactive flowcharts, and advanced data tables. Perfect for building admin dashboards and business applications.

{"type":"object","properties":{"personalInfo":{"title":"Personal Information","type":"object","properties":{"firstName":{"title":"First Name","type":"string","required":true,"placeholder":"Enter your first name"},"lastName":{"title":"Last Name","type":"string","required":true,"placeholder":"Enter your last name"},"email":{"title":"Email Address","type":"string","format":"email","required":true,"placeholder":"your.email@example.com"},"phone":{"title":"Phone Number","type":"string","placeholder":"+1 (555) 123-4567"}}},"preferences":{"title":"Preferences","type":"object","properties":{"role":{"title":"Role","type":"string","enum":["developer","designer","manager","other"],"enumNames":["Developer","Designer","Manager","Other"],"required":true},"skills":{"title":"Skills","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"widget":"multiSelect","enum":["JavaScript","React","Node.js","Python","TypeScript","Vue.js","Angular"],"enumNames":["JavaScript","React","Node.js","Python","TypeScript","Vue.js","Angular"]},"experience":{"title":"Years of Experience","type":"number","minimum":0,"maximum":50},"bio":{"title":"Bio","type":"string","format":"textarea","placeholder":"Tell us about yourself..."},"newsletter":{"title":"Subscribe to newsletter","type":"boolean","default":true}}}}}
